Introducing incremental enrichment in Azure Cognitive Search
Incremental enrichment is a new feature of Azure Cognitive Search that brings a declarative approach to indexing your data. Microsoft is expanding the Azure Stack Edge with NVIDIA GPU preview
We’re expanding the Microsoft Azure Stack Edge with NVIDIA T4 Tensor Core GPU preview during the GPU Technology Conference (GTC Digital). Azure Stack Edge is a cloud-managed appliance that brings Azure’s compute, storage, and machine learning capabilities to the edge for fast local analysis and insights.
